sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR, A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID, A.WEIGHT_GRP_ID, A.WEIGHT_GRP_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CBE_EVAL_MASTER B WHERE B.YEAR=A.YEAR AND B.EVAL_DEGREE_ID = A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID AND B.WEIGHT_GRP_ID=A.WEIGHT_GRP_ID) USER_CNT, CASE WHEN A.FRS_DEPT_WEIGHT IS NULL THEN '' ELSE A.FRS_DEPT_WEIGHT||'%' END FRS_DEPT_WEIGHT , CASE WHEN A.SEC_DEPT_WEIGHT IS NULL THEN '' ELSE A.SEC_DEPT_WEIGHT||'%' END SEC_DEPT_WEIGHT , CASE WHEN A.TEAM_WEIGHT IS NULL THEN '' ELSE A.TEAM_WEIGHT||'%' END TEAM_WEIGHT , CASE WHEN A.PRS_WEIGHT IS NULL THEN '' ELSE A.PRS_WEIGHT||'%' END PRS_WEIGHT , A.SORT_ORDER FROM CBE_WEIGHT_GRP A WHERE A.YEAR=#findYear# AND A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID=#findEvalDegreeId# ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER
